name: The Troll Land
description:
The Troll Land

**********

Story:

Zern’omal is an island of trolls, it used to have a leader, civilization, and forces of trolls. The trolls lived a fair life there, and they were well protected both spiritually through their rituals, and physically through their cultural troops. However, it was invaded by several other horde clans that led to its destruction. Then, it became a jungle habitat that still has the leftover trolls surviving there, and among them is a fierce and well-trained warrior. His name is Kaz’ron, a royal lieutenant who pledged his loyalty to his people and homeland and will strike any invader who dares to come near his homeland.

**********

Characters:

(3 HP Equally)

Main Character: Kaz’ron - The Troll Player

Enemy 1: Intruder – Goblin Invader

Enemy 2: Pillager – Goblin Warrior

**********

Notes:

Collect 100 coins to win the game

Avoid the traps (Fires & Spikes)

AWD movement (W is for jumping)

Left click to throw axes

Kill Goblins with 3 axes each

Take a health to heal

**********

Have Fun!
